comment: Wonderful professor and mentor. I would highly recommend taking any class from him.

Dr. Baker teaches effectively, highlighting important aspects from the material concisely and managing class time effectively. Expectations for individual assignments were occasionally vague, causing me and classmates to feel unsure of how to prepare for them and succeed, and individual grades typically did not explain why we did well or poorly.

Dr. Baker is the best professor ever! He is very intelligent and very helpful! His tests are easy for those who prepare for them. he usually gives out guideline :) He is always there for you to learn, to understand, and to do well!
Great professor. Very helpful, flexible and knowledgeable. Thank you!!!!

Dear Dr. Baker, how are you now?!!All the Chinese students love you so much. We still remembered the first day when we arrived America. You came to pick them up. That day was so cold. We were so moved. Thank you so much for your help and we love the baseball game so much now hahahahahaha, Love you ~~~
I had Dr. Baker for an internship and he was awesome.  Very helpful and smart.  He is easily approachable and wants his students to do well.
Nice Guy, fair interesting classes does not overwork you.
